repository.corpname: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries

did.abstract: The collection contains original editorial cartoons drawn by Bob Englehart. The cartoons are generally 8.5 inches by 11.5 inches in size. An additional signed copy of a cartoon is also included.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: A native of Indiana, Bob Englehart studied at the American Academy of Art in Chicago before joining the staff of Chicago Today in 1966 as cartoonist and illustrator. In 1972, Englehart returned to Fort Wayne, Indiana as a free-lance artist for The Journal-Gazette. He became a full-time cartoonist in 1975 when he joined the staff of The Journal Herald ( Dayton, Ohio). In 1980, Englehart was hired as the first full-time editorial cartoonist for The Hartford Courant ( Hartford, Connecticut). Englehart's cartoons are now syndicated and he has published several collections of his editorial cartoons in addition to illustrating a children's book and providing television cartoon commentary.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains the original artwork for editorial cartoons published in The Hartford Courant in 1995-1996, 2005-2009. A signed copy of a 1987 cartoon is also included.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is chronologically arranged in one series.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from both the University of Connecticut Libraries and the owner(s) of the copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item description, #:#], Bob Englehart Collection. Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The collection of original cartoons (1995) was donated by Dick Wright in 2004. The signed photocopy was donated by Norman Stevens in 2003. The more recent cartoons (2005-2009) were donated by William M. Schorr. Two framed cartoons were donated in 2012.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of materials pertaining to Connecticut politics. For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the Reading Room desk.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open and available for research.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: [Note: General topical descriptions for the cartoons have been supplied by the processor for access purposes only.]

did.unittitle: Y'Know...You're really starting to get on my nerves (Middle East),
House of Representatives education funding cuts,
President Barack Obama and Nobel Prize,
